name: SWAT Mission
description:
Arm yourself with heavy weapons like pistol, shotgun assault rifles, M4, M16, MP5 and AK-47 gun. Aim the enemy army soldiers and shoot to kill with heavy armor

FEATURES
* Great graphics for a very small sized First Person Shooter!
* 100+ Great levels to finish which means hours of fun gameplay!
* Awsome and vivid sound effects.
* Fast loading game, very low waiting times, as game is meant for pure enjoyment!
